metadata.feature_description: Granular permission system for folders and files supporting user and role-based access control

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel and hover over Images folder
steps.expected: Folder action icons should appear on hover
steps.actual: Edit, Move, and Delete icons appeared on hover

steps.action: Click on edit/pencil icon to open folder details
steps.expected: Folder details panel should open with DETAILS and PERMISSIONS tabs
steps.actual: Folder details panel opened with both tabs visible

steps.action: Click on PERMISSIONS tab
steps.expected: Permissions grid should display with roles and permission columns
steps.actual: Permissions grid displayed with all roles and 7 permission types

steps.action: Click on Browse Folder checkbox for All Users
steps.expected: Permission should toggle through states (Allow, Deny, Not Set)
steps.actual: Permission toggled from checked to minus (Deny) state

steps.action: Click on View Folder checkbox for All Users
steps.expected: View Folder permission should toggle
steps.actual: View Folder permission toggled from Allow to Deny state

steps.action: Click on Add checkbox for All Users
steps.expected: Add permission should be enabled
steps.actual: Add permission was set to Allow (checkmark visible)

steps.action: Click on Delete checkbox for All Users
steps.expected: Delete permission should be enabled
steps.actual: Delete permission was set to Allow (checkmark visible)

steps.action: Click on Manage checkbox for All Users
steps.expected: Manage permission should be enabled
steps.actual: Manage permission was set to Allow (checkmark visible)

steps.action: Observe inherited permissions for Administrators, Content Editors, Content Managers
steps.expected: Inherited permissions should display lock icons and be read-only
steps.actual: Lock icons visible for all inherited role permissions

steps.action: Click on locked permission for Administrators
steps.expected: Locked permissions should not respond to clicks
steps.actual: Click did not change the permission state - locks remain in place

steps.action: Select 'Moderators' from Select Role dropdown and click ADD
steps.expected: Moderators role should be added to the permissions grid
steps.actual: Moderators role was added with View Folder permission enabled by default

steps.action: Type 'super' in Add User field
steps.expected: Autocomplete should show matching users
steps.actual: Autocomplete dropdown appeared with 'SuperUser Account' option

steps.action: Select SuperUser Account and click ADD
steps.expected: User should be added to the Users permissions table
steps.actual: SuperUser Account was added with View Folder permission and Delete action available

steps.action: Set multiple permissions for All Users (Browse=Deny, View=Deny, Add=Allow, Delete=Allow, Manage=Allow)
steps.expected: Multiple permission states should be visible simultaneously
steps.actual: All Users row correctly shows mixed permission states with different icons

steps.action: Click Save button to save permissions
steps.expected: Permissions should be saved and panel should close
steps.actual: Panel closed after save, returned to file list view

steps.action: Re-open Images folder permissions to verify persistence
steps.expected: All saved permissions should be retained
steps.actual: All permissions persisted correctly - Moderators role and SuperUser Account visible with saved permission states

steps.action: Make a permission change (toggle Browse for Moderators)
steps.expected: Permission should change visually
steps.actual: Permission was toggled to Deny state

steps.action: Click Cancel button
steps.expected: Changes should be discarded and panel should close
steps.actual: Panel closed without saving changes, returned to file list view

steps.action: Click Delete link in Actions column for Moderators role
steps.expected: Moderators role should be removed from permissions grid
steps.actual: Moderators row was removed and role reappeared in Select Role dropdown

steps.action: Click Save to persist deletion
steps.expected: Role deletion should be saved
steps.actual: Panel closed after save, deletion persisted

steps.action: Type 'host' in Add User field (username instead of display name)
steps.expected: Search should show no results or provide feedback
steps.actual: 'No results' message was displayed, indicating search by display name is required

observations: Permission inheritance is indicated by lock icons - locked permissions cannot be modified at the subfolder level
Three-state permissions: Allow (checkmark), Deny (minus), Not Set (empty checkbox)
User search in Add User field requires searching by display name, not username
Newly added roles get View Folder permission enabled by default
Newly added users get View Folder permission enabled by default
Community Manager role has Browse (Allow) and View (Deny) set as specific folder-level permissions with Delete action available
Code files were not available locally in the repository, testing was performed entirely through UI interaction
